question: I have had Adenomyosis for over 10 yrs, and symptoms have been getting worse, I am 45 with no diabetes or HT. Over the past 4 months I have been having a large amt. of unexplained symptoms, mainly during menses. I have seen many specialists for diagnosed parasites, IBS, ISVD, Strabismus(no cause found), RT factor, and unexplained incidences such as panic disorder and cold intolerability. Recently, had an event that was similar to a miscarriage, but testing showed otherwise. I have seen an endocrin., but because I was having symptoms of both hypo and hyper at the time, since blood tests came back 'normal', he went textbook on me. I will be seeing another endocrin. and IM within the next month as they are highly recommended, and just had a endom. biopsy done. Any suggestions would be much appreciated. I am at the end of the line here!
